evidence_example.title: Uart isr (polling, blocking mode) test demo
evidence_example.small_descr: This is the demo to test Uart isr (polling, blocking mode) on FPG-EYE Board devices.
evidence_example.long_descr:
Uart isr test(polling, blocking mode).

This demo shows how to use UART driver for Lattice Mico32 device to send and receive characters.

The UART controller is configured in polling mode and in blocking mode but is enabled the UART IRQ support.

The demo should wait one character when task calls EE_uart_receive_byte and should wait 5 characters when task calls EE_uart_receive_buffer.

In case of error the application turns on the system led.

The demo requires a RS232 serial connection with a 115200 bps, 8N1 configuration.
